name: Nobody Said Life Is Fair
description:
Nobody Said Life Is Fair

A short and simple platformer where "DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!"

First game and game jam.
Learning from gamedev.tv videos and some others.

Pixel Adventure 1(Free Assets from Unity Store) and To Have to in Least Water(Sound from YouTube AudioLibrary).
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360#pub...
https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCzGaunbUxe75mp0RXGRG3Dw/music

Controls

  • Move (a,d) or (left arrow, right arrow)
  • Jump (space)

Changes

  • 2022.06.02
    • Updated Description to show Controls and Sections
